description: [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) has identified domain admins through the use of `net group "Domain admins" /DOMAIN`. [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) has also leveraged the PowerShell cmdlet `Get-ADComputer` to collect account names from Active Directory data.(Citation: DFIR Ryuk's Return October 2020)(Citation: Mandiant FIN12 Oct 2021)

external_references.description: Shilko, J., et al. (2021, October 7). FIN12: The Prolific Ransomware Intrusion Threat Actor That Has Aggressively Pursued Healthcare Targets. Retrieved June 15, 2023.
